attributes.additional_details:
1) Abolish icome tax for everyone that has a annual income of less than £40k per year

2) increase VAT to 25%

3)why ? Well this will start the recovery for good as if you are GREEDY you pay more tax.

This plan will make Britain GREAT again it is simple the more that you consume the more you pay the tax man, also the INLAND REVENUE can Concentrate on collecting TAX  eg. CAR WASH / restaurants / TRAVELLERS !!!/ building trades are huge blackmarkets also drug dealers will PAY.

VAT HITS EVERYONE INCOME TAX HAS A LOT OF LOOPHOLES

sign up let us all tax everyone not just the people that follow the rules
